author: Wang, Q
adress: Binzhou Med Univ Hosp, Yantai Affiliated Hosp, Dept Ophthalmol, Yantai, Shandong, Peoples R China
title: Sulforaphane Attenuates H2O2-induced Oxidant Stress in Human Trabecular Meshwork Cells (HTMCs) via the Phosphatidylinositol 3-Kinase (PI3K)/Serine/Threonine Kinase (Akt)-Mediated Factor-E2-Related Factor 2 (Nrf2) Signaling Activation
